live_updates: Our technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage. Thank you for your patience.
52018.summary: Some customers in British Columbia may experience an slow speeds when connecting to Shaw WiFi Access Points. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
52018.title: Aug 3 – British Columbia| WiFi Access Points - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Technicians will continue working to restore service and we will have an update in the morning. If you have a Hitron modem, please unplug your modem for 30 seconds then it plug back in.
Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
52268.summary: Some customers with Hitron modems may experience a loss of Internet services. To resolve this, please unplug your modem for 30 seconds then it plug back in.
